page.title: 19LOCAL ISSUES_PEACE CAMP.
page.content: A major issue which is concerning some residents of Rhu and Shandon is the Peace Camp which has been set up near to the entrance of the Clyde Submarine Base at Faslane in protest over the Government's decision to deploy nuclear weapons.Whilst many people agree with the principles behind the campers'actions,some residents are disturbed that such an unsightly development has been allowed to remain in an area of high amenity and argue that this is having an adverse effect on the value and sale of nearby properties.There have also been a few incidents where the actions of the peace campers have affected local people with delays in getting to work at the Base and long tail_backs of traffic and many people have suggested that this is perhaps not the best way to go about their protest.
